trans-unit.source: This article provides a detailed overview of locations where services are offered and how to connect to Azure regions.
trans-unit.target: This article provides a detailed overview of locations where services are offered and how to connect to Azure regions.

trans-unit.source: The tables in this article provide information on ExpressRoute connectivity providers (EXPs and NSPs), ExpressRoute geographical coverage, Microsoft cloud services supported over ExpressRoute, and ExpressRoute System Integrators (SIs).
trans-unit.target: The tables in this article provide information on ExpressRoute connectivity providers (EXPs and NSPs), ExpressRoute geographical coverage, Microsoft cloud services supported over ExpressRoute, and ExpressRoute System Integrators (SIs).

trans-unit.source: ExpressRoute is supported across all Azure regions and locations.
trans-unit.target: ExpressRoute is supported across all Azure regions and locations.

trans-unit.source: The following map provides a list of Azure regions and ExpressRoute locations.
trans-unit.target: The following map provides a list of Azure regions and ExpressRoute locations.

trans-unit.source: ExpressRoute locations refer to those where Microsoft peers with several service providers.
trans-unit.target: ExpressRoute locations refer to those where Microsoft peers with several service providers.

trans-unit.source: You will have access to Azure services across all regions within a geopolitical region if you connected to at least one ExpressRoute location within the geopolitical region.
trans-unit.target: You will have access to Azure services across all regions within a geopolitical region if you connected to at least one ExpressRoute location within the geopolitical region.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides a map of Azure regions to ExpressRoute locations within a geopolitical region.
trans-unit.target: The following table provides a map of Azure regions to ExpressRoute locations within a geopolitical region.

trans-unit.source: All US Regions - East US, West US, East US 2, Central US, South Central US, North Central US
trans-unit.target: All US Regions - East US, West US, East US 2, Central US, South Central US, North Central US

trans-unit.source: Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, New York, Seattle, Silicon Valley, Washington DC
trans-unit.target: Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, New York, Seattle, Silicon Valley, Washington DC

trans-unit.source: India West, India Central, India South
trans-unit.target: India West, India Central, India South

trans-unit.source: Connectivity across geopolitical regions is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Connectivity across geopolitical regions is not supported.

trans-unit.source: You can work with your connectivity provider to extend connectivity across geopolitical regions using their network.
trans-unit.target: You can work with your connectivity provider to extend connectivity across geopolitical regions using their network.

trans-unit.source: Amsterdam, Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Hong Kong, London, Los Angeles, Melbourne, New York, Sao Paulo, Seattle, Silicon Valley, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo, Washington DC
trans-unit.target: Amsterdam, Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Hong Kong, London, Los Angeles, Melbourne, New York, Sao Paulo, Seattle, Silicon Valley, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo, Washington DC

trans-unit.source: Chicago, Dallas, London, Seattle, Silicon Valley, Washington DC
trans-unit.target: Chicago, Dallas, London, Seattle, Silicon Valley, Washington DC

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Configure your EXP connection</linkText><title></title> for steps to set up your connection.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Configure your EXP connection</linkText><title></title> for steps to set up your connection.

trans-unit.source: Amsterdam+, London+, Dallas, Silicon Valley, Washington DC
trans-unit.target: Amsterdam+, London+, Dallas, Silicon Valley, Washington DC

trans-unit.source: Amsterdam, London, Silicon Valley+, Washington DC
trans-unit.target: Amsterdam, London, Silicon Valley+, Washington DC

trans-unit.source: Chicago, Dallas, London, Seattle, Silicon Valley, Washington DC
trans-unit.target: Chicago, Dallas, London, Seattle, Silicon Valley, Washington DC

trans-unit.source: Amsterdam, London, Silicon Valley, Washington DC
trans-unit.target: Amsterdam, London, Silicon Valley, Washington DC

trans-unit.source: Amsterdam, Chennai+, Hong Kong, London, Mumbai+, Singapore
trans-unit.target: Amsterdam, Chennai+, Hong Kong, London, Mumbai+, Singapore

trans-unit.source: London, Hong Kong, Silicon Valley, Washington DC
trans-unit.target: London, Hong Kong, Silicon Valley, Washington DC

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Configure your NSP connection</linkText><title></title> for steps to set up your connection.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Configure your NSP connection</linkText><title></title> for steps to set up your connection.

trans-unit.source: If your connectivity provider is not listed in previous sections, you can still create a connection.
trans-unit.target: If your connectivity provider is not listed in previous sections, you can still create a connection.

trans-unit.source: Check with your connectivity provider to see if they are connected to any of the Exchange providers in the listed EXP locations.
trans-unit.target: Check with your connectivity provider to see if they are connected to any of the Exchange providers in the listed EXP locations.

trans-unit.source: You can check the following links to gather more information about services offered by Exchange Providers.
trans-unit.target: You can check the following links to gather more information about services offered by Exchange Providers.

trans-unit.source: Several connectivity providers are already connected to EXPs' Ethernet exchanges.
trans-unit.target: Several connectivity providers are already connected to EXPs' Ethernet exchanges.

trans-unit.source: Have your connectivity provider extend your network to the Exchange location of choice.
trans-unit.target: Have your connectivity provider extend your network to the Exchange location of choice.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your connectivity provider extends your connectivity in a highly available manner so that there are no single points of failure.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that your connectivity provider extends your connectivity in a highly available manner so that there are no single points of failure.

trans-unit.source: Connectivity providers (specifically Ethernet providers) may require you to procure a pair of circuits to the Ethernet exchanges to ensure high availability.
trans-unit.target: Connectivity providers (specifically Ethernet providers) may require you to procure a pair of circuits to the Ethernet exchanges to ensure high availability.

trans-unit.source: Order an ExpressRoute circuit through the Exchange provider to connect to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Order an ExpressRoute circuit through the Exchange provider to connect to Azure.

trans-unit.source: Follow steps in <linkText>Configure your EXP connection</linkText><title></title> to set up connectivity.
trans-unit.target: Follow steps in <linkText>Configure your EXP connection</linkText><title></title> to set up connectivity.

trans-unit.source: Enabling private connectivity to fit your needs can be challenging, based on the scale of your network.
trans-unit.target: Enabling private connectivity to fit your needs can be challenging, based on the scale of your network.

trans-unit.source: You can work with any of the System Integrators listed in the following table to assist you with onboarding to ExpressRoute.
trans-unit.target: You can work with any of the System Integrators listed in the following table to assist you with onboarding to ExpressRoute.

trans-unit.source: Verify that you meet the <linkText>ExpressRoute prerequisites</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Verify that you meet the <linkText>ExpressRoute prerequisites</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to configure an ExpressRoute connection, see <linkText>Configure your EXP connection</linkText><title></title> or <linkText>Configure your NSP connection</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to configure an ExpressRoute connection, see <linkText>Configure your EXP connection</linkText><title></title> or <linkText>Configure your NSP connection</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to configure both a site-to-site VPN connection and ExpressRoute for the same virtual network, see <linkText>Configure ExpressRoute and Site-to-Site VPN connections that coexist</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to configure both a site-to-site VPN connection and ExpressRoute for the same virtual network, see <linkText>Configure ExpressRoute and Site-to-Site VPN connections that coexist</linkText><title></title>.
